A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They killed the trilogy for me. Luke is a disaster\, a bunch of plot holes\, a tons of scene was nonsense\, lame jokes...etc. I wish I never saw that movie. I hope I can watch Luke in the original trilogy with the same eyes as I watched him before this movie. Damn. I'm angry and dissapointed. The CGI was top notch btw.
